# CI/CD Status Badges

Add these badges to your main README.md to show build status:

## Build and Sign Status

```markdown
[![Build and Sign](https://github.com/nikryden/LogViewer2026/actions/workflows/build-and-sign.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/nikryden/LogViewer2026/actions/workflows/build-and-sign.yml)
```

[![Build and Sign](https://github.com/nikryden/LogViewer2026/actions/workflows/build-and-sign.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/nikryden/LogViewer2026/actions/workflows/build-and-sign.yml)

## Installer Creation


[![Create Installer](https://github.com/nikryden/LogViewer2026/actions/workflows/create-installer.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/nikryden/LogViewer2026/actions/workflows/create-installer.yml)

## Latest Release


[![Latest Release](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/nikryden/LogViewer2026)](https://github.com/nikryden/LogViewer2026/releases/latest)

## Complete Example

Add this to the top of your README.md:

```markdown
# LogViewer2026 - High-Performance Serilog Log Viewer

[![Build and Sign](https://github.com/nikryden/LogViewer2026/actions/workflows/build-and-sign.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/nikryden/LogViewer2026/actions/workflows/build-and-sign.yml)
[![Latest Release](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/nikryden/LogViewer2026)](https://github.com/nikryden/LogViewer2026/releases/latest)
[![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/nikryden/LogViewer2026/total)](https://github.com/nikryden/LogViewer2026/releases)
[![License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/nikryden/LogViewer2026)](./LICENSE)

[Other badges you can add]
[![.NET](https://img.shields.io/badge/.NET-10.0-512BD4)](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/)
[![Platform](https://img.shields.io/badge/platform-Windows-blue)](https://www.microsoft.com/windows)
[![PRs Welcome](https://img.shields.io/badge/PRs-welcome-brightgreen.svg)](./CONTRIBUTING.md)
```
